author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tile tip for shower valve…I used a template and 4 inch diamond hole saw to make this cut. Then I polished the tile with a chamfer cone. Some folks say ‘nobody will see this work’ but they’re incorrect. I will see it and my clients will, too. I want them to know that I appreciate the opportunity to work in their home. And that I’m doing my best work for them at all times🔥#respect #dothework #tileshower #bathroomremodel
title: Tile Tip for Shower Valve - #shorts #tileshower #diy #homerepairtutor
